title: Putin offers easier path to citizenship for foreigners who join Russian military
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has made it easier to gain Russian citizenship for foreigners who join his country’s military. Putin signed the decree allowing the easier path to Russian citizenship Thursday as the war in Ukraine nears two years. title: We cannot settle for a world half fed and half hungry
description: In this time of unparalleled crisis, we must not settle for a world half fed and half hungry. We have to come together, and work together, to stave off the real and dangerous risk of widespread starvation in the months ahead.

title: US Mint releases $5, $1 and half-dollar Harriet Tubman coins
description: The U.S. Mint on Thursday began accepting pre-orders for its first-ever commemorative coin program honoring abolitionist Harriet Tubman. The 2024 collection includes a $5 gold coin, a $1 silver one and a half-dollar silver coin.
